title: Five Stars
review: This watch is awesome.you can wear it anywhere like party or in college or in office.Watch looks very sober and decent.but it's dial looks great and service of flipkart was also nice. I would say that all should order through flipkart assured in that product comes on time and packaging is also nice....So 5star

title: Good but nothing fancy
review:
Nice watch with a stylish design. 
The saddest part is that, the watch package is coming without a warranty card!
The watch is having little bit more weight than I thought. So I decided to returned but the executive came to collect the product said that, he couldn't accept it without the warranty card! Within that days, I was falling in love with the watch so I changed my mind to returns it! Even though, Imagine a product that cost around 2K is selling without a warranty card! I'm wondering what can I do if I met any issue with this watch in future without the warranty card! 

By designwise and qualitywise, it will be a great decision if you choose to buy this! But remember in mind about the warranty card!!☺️

title: Super!
review: This watch from FasTrack is just awesome. And a great work done by Flipkart. I got it for 1616 RS after applying the coupons. So this black magic was is so beautiful with the brown strap. You can sport it with casuals as well as formals. Perfect weight and perfect size. Keep up the good work Flipkart.

title: Ordered, received, arranged for taking back, amount credited back to account. all in 3 days.. flipkart rocks..!
review:
was able to order the watch after a long wait, and flipkart delivered on 2nd day.
was happy on receiving the watch, but when opened the piece was damaged. on first look itself felt the glass on one side is projecting little out,, and when turned upside down, the glass came off.. directly called flipkart customer care, arranged for taking back,   next day morning the flipkart guy came and collected the watch and amount credited back to my bank account.. and that was my experience with this watch from fastrack sold through flipkart delivered through e-kart.

title: Worst experience ever!

title: Nice product
review:
I'm satisfied but with for sure some cons. are always present
Cons.-
1.)The leather don't feel worth it and is prone to slight bend and colour becomes dull in not more than 2 days.
2.)Beware for the dial it may lock up with your apparel and might lead to some damage.
3.)Watch is slightly in-proportionate as it is more thick than expected.
4.) Kindly have your conversations with the company for your warranty.
